Zero paperwork: we handle all documents. High installation rate dossiers, fast payment. Only working with quality call centers and established operations.

name: Lafayette Bilingual Call Center
notes: For its extension, a call center based in Lafayette recruits bilingual teleoperators (English and Arabic) for Arabic and English call reception missions at the center or remotely for day and night shifts. What we offer: Very interesting salary. CDI contract from 3rd day. Unlimited performance bonuses. Requirements: Excellent capacity to respect schedule. Good organization and coordination capacity. Have good internet connection. Have PC or smartphone. Capable of working autonomously. Bilingual Arabic/English (telephone). Comfortable with digital universe, capable of learning quickly. Rigor, professionalism and work ethics. For more information contact us.
